alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Jackson; La Crosse; Monroe; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:33PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Buffalo, northern La Crosse, southwestern Jackson, northwestern Monroe and Trempealeau Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Strum to near Whitehall to near Arcadia. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Galesville and North Bend around 505 PM CDT. Black River Falls around 520 PM CDT. Onalaska, Holmen and Cataract around 525 PM CDT. Sparta, West Salem, Bangor, Millston and Fort Mc Coy around 530 PM CDT. People attending the La Crosse County Fairgrounds should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Jackson; La Crosse; Monroe; Trempealeau
